skillTree.localised_description: All Dwarfs despise the Greenskins, for the urki and grobi are the prime agents in the Times of Woe.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +15% when fighting against Greenskins

skillTree.localised_description: Dwarfs are resolute - once they commit to charging the foe, they put all their strength behind that initial blow.
Dwarfs are not fast, yet they will soldier on, always moving despite any hazards encountered.
The endless courage of the Warrior God, directed to bolster this Dawi’s own reserves.
Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

skillTree.localised_description: Borri’s father, Gomrund Forkbeard, was a Lord of Karak Kadrin and ambassador to King Ulfar Stonehammer. During a negotiation, King Stonehammer received word that his scouts had spotted warriors of the Dawi-Zharr encroaching on his lands. The King mustered his throng without hesitation and marched to face their tainted kin accompanied by his cousins, Grim, Grom and Grum, and Lord Forkbeard’s own guard. Ever since that day, Lord Forkbeard has served King Stonehammer and his Clan faithfully. Gomrund’s son Borri, having grown up alongside Ulther Stonehammer, eventually succeeded his father as Champion of Clan Durazgrund.
Having known him since they were Garazi, Borri’s loyalty and love for Ulther is profound, and he would gladly follow his Lord to the ends of the earth.

effects.description:
No Upkeep for Ulther Stonehammer and Borri Forkbeard
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Many have pledged oaths to Ulther in his quest to reclaim and secure Karak Ungor. It’s time to put those oaths to use.
With his massive greataxe in hand, Borri charges headfirst into enemy lines without fear, cleaving his way through scores of Urks.
Borri has personally seen to the strict and rigorous training of every warrior of the Dragon Company, ensuring that each and every single one of them are ready to fight to the last if duty calls.

effects.description:
Unit experience gain per turn: +15
	(Lord's army)

Enables  Unbreakable for the Dragon Company
	(Hero's army)

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit does not suffer any form of leadership loss and will never rout.

skillTree.localised_description: This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.
Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.
Full-plate armour protects the wearer from head-to-foot. Many such suits are blessed or imbued with arcane abilities.
Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.
A deadly blade is especially lethal when in the hands of this master death-maker, killer and slaughterer!
From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.
Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.
The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.
The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.
A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.
Only the best weapons and armour are good enough for this strong and noble Dawi hero.
Never give up, never give in, never retreat, and never, ever surrender. Never give an inch; always move forward.
This one's reputation for great deeds in the service of all Dwarfkind ensures other Dawi always have a care for his wellbeing.
Long periods spent tracking foes far from the safety of the Holds makes experts at approaching enemies from unexpected angles.

effects.description:
Attribute: Snipe for Rangers units
	(all units in army)

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit remains hidden while firing.
This unit can move hidden in any terrain.
This unit can deploy outside the deployment zone.

skillTree.localised_description: Bearing the arms and wearing the armour of his Ancestors make it quite clear that only a coward and a failure blames his tools.
People have a habit of following the suicidally brave into danger, mistaking their madness for courage.
There are Lords that radiate power, confidence and fear, inspiring their followers to great or terrible acts.

effects.description:
Unit experience gain per turn: +75
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Borri knows his throng thrives in ranged combat and expects his Clansdwarfs to excel in that discipline.

effects.description:
Ammunition: +10% for Quarrellers, Thunderers, and Rangers units
	(Hero's army)

Ammunition: +10% for Quarrellers, Thunderers, and Rangers units
	(Hero's army)

Missile strength: +6% for Quarrellers, Thunderers, and Rangers units
	(Hero's army)

Ammunition: +15% for Quarrellers, Thunderers, and Rangers units
	(Hero's army)

Missile strength: +8% for Quarrellers, Thunderers, and Rangers units
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: This champion extols discipline and fear away from the battlefield as much as on it.

effects.description: Training action: Unit experience gain is increased by an additional 10%
Training action: Unit experience gain is increased by an additional 20%
Training action: Unit experience gain is increased by an additional 30%

skillTree.localised_description: Those in the army can find succour or be replenished by the power of this champion.

effects.description: Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 3%
Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 6%
Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 9%

skillTree.localised_description: "If they know I'm coming then more's the better!"

effects.description: Assault Garrison action: Additional 5% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 30% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: A skilled assassin is a cold-hearted killer and merciless murderer.
Lying in wait, experienced and patient, striking when the foe least expects.

effects.description: Assault Units action: Additional 3% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 8% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.

items.colour_text: Forged and inscribed by the same Runesmith that crafted the Battleaxe of Durazgrund, this mighty greataxe is perhaps even deadlier thanks to the Master Rune of Smiting upon its surface.

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.

items.colour_text: A bulky set of armour assembled from the best Gromril make Borri an immovable rock on the battlefield

related_attributes.bullet_text: When bracing, this unit negates the charge bonus of any attacker.
This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Borri Forkbeard loyally serves as the Dragon Company’s second-in-command and Ulther’s guardian.

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

target_if: Unit is a Lord or Hero
